description:
The citizens of the city can`t look away from the intense Duel where Yuuya has managed to summon five monsters at the same time...! Jack powers up his Red Demons and gives everything he`s got to take on Yuuya!! There`s not a moment to catch your breath, the conclusion of the championship match of the Friendship Cup, the Duel between Yuuya and Jack, is about to be settled...! But at the same time, the Council and Roget, each with their own plans, begin to move anew...!
Source: crunchyroll
